live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53026.summary: Some customers in the Roslyn area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53026.title: Sept 2 - Winnipeg (Roslyn) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53048.summary: Some customers in the Pineview area of St. Albert are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53048.title: Sep 2 - St. Albert (Pineview) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
